Building Features

Recently remodeled contemporary style office building located in West Los Angeles. Conveniently located in the heart of West LA. Features of the office space include:

  • Elevator access
  • Plentiful natural light
  • Lobby waiting area
  • Janitorial service
  • Intercom entrance, gated garage.
  • Plenty of FREE street parking
  • Parking ratio 1 spot / 1,000 SF on monthly rent

Newly Renovated Office Spaces for Lease - Ideal for Startups and Established Businesses

Suite 300 - 1,551 square feet at $4,800/month

TERM:

• Lease term: Negotiable
• Parking: Optional parking spaces available for $160 per spot per month in an assigned shared tandem spot
• Utilities included except for phone and internet

HIGHLIGHTS:

Kitchenette: Kitchen is equipped with a small kitchenette, allowing you to prepare snacks or enjoy a cup of coffee without leaving the premises.

In suite Lavatory: Enhanced Convenience and Self-contained Hygiene. You have exclusive control over the cleanliness of the restroom.

Abundant Natural Light: Enjoy a bright and energizing work environment with plenty of natural daylight flowing into each office space. Big window openings, balcony access and view of Century City and Santa Monica Blvd.

Prime Location: Our office spaces offer convenient access to all major freeways (10 & 405) and are centrally located between Santa Monica, Century City, Brentwood, and Beverly Hills. You'll also find a wide range of amenities in the surrounding area.

Proximity to Dining Options: Take advantage of the walking distance to a variety of restaurants, making lunch breaks and client meetings a breeze.

Modern Amenities: Benefit from features such as an intercom with keypad building entrance, individual AC/heating control, bus line access, gated garage, and ample free street parking for you and your clients' convenience.

This fantastic office space is located in a Class-B office building situated at the corner of Westwood Blvd and the north side of LITTLE Santa Monica Blvd. The contemporary facade of the 3-story building, composed of stones and glass, adds a touch of sophistication. You'll appreciate the proximity to UCLA, Westwood Village, Santa Monica, Bel Air, Century City, and Beverly Hills.

Please note: Measurements are approximate NRSF (Net Rentable Square Feet). There are no CAM (Common Area Maintenance) or NNN (Triple Net) charges. The square footages provided are approximate, and the rental rates are flat fees.

If you're interested in securing a professional and conveniently located office space, please don't hesitate to contact us for further information or to schedule a viewing. We're excited to help you find the perfect space to support your business's success!
